subject: Simsonn Plus X Throttle Pedal Sound
description_text:
When I press the Simsonn Plus X throttle it starts with liquid sound then
when it’s fully pressed it gets to a higher pitched squeak. I am wondering
if it is normal.

conversations.body_text: Hi Wenyu Huang,      This is normal—the sound you hear is the liquid flowing, as it is a pure liquid damper.
